PLAT_APPMODEL_FORMCONTROL.FORMCONTROL_FINCODE:
<plattag:number name="DEPART_TREESN" allowblank="false" auth_type="write" 
      value="${depart.DEPART_TREESN}" step="1" 
      decimals="0"
      
      
      label_value="部门排序"
      placeholder="请输入同级排序"
      comp_col_num="4"
      label_col_num="2"
      
      
      max="1000000"
      min="1"
   >
   </plattag:number>

PLAT_APPMODEL_FORMCONTROL.FORMCONTROL_TPLCODE:
layoutsize="${layoutsize}" <#if CONTROL_ID??&&CONTROL_ID!="" >id="${CONTROL_ID}" > <#list layoutlist as layout>
id="${layout.LAYOUT_ID}" <#if layout.SUPPORT_YSCROLL=="1" >style="overflow-y:auto;" >

<form method="post" class="form-horizontal platdesigncomp" platcompname="表单容器" compcode="${FORMCONTROL_COMPCODE}"
compcontrolid="${FORMCONTROL_ID}" platcomid="${FORMCONTROL_ID}" uibtnsrights="add,edit,del"
action="${FORM_ACTION!''}" id="${CONTROL_ID}" style="${FORM_STYLE!''}">

</form>
